data.name: Blaze in Space: Beat a-maze
data.detailed_description:
Blaze in Space will bring you back in time to the old school labyrinths but with a twist. Go through dozens of levels and let your friends or challengers from all around the world have a go at your records. Speed through, gather all stars and don’t let the malevolent cosmos slow you down!

Modern Arcade




Arcade games are meant to be grasped easily and offer plenty of action. Through simple controls and intuitive mechanics it makes it extremely easy to start the game but its fast speed ensures a challenge to those wishing to truly master it. After all, each mistake costs seconds that are precious ranking-wise!

Puzzle vs Reflex


Once in motion you need to keep moving, making split-second choices. Will you try to gather all the cores and arrive at the finishing portal with your reflexes alone or will you take a moment to plan the perfect path? Choose your gaming style and go for it!

Compete Globally & With Friends


Blaze in Space lets you create local rankings for you and your friends only. Whether you choose to take over the world(‘s rankings) or just kick your peers' spaceships in the rear is entirely up to you!

data.short_description: Fast-paced, brain teasing arcade game with competitive focus. Find an optimal route and speed through a blazing maze where you pilot ever-accelerating ship.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.1 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10, 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.6 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
